79463.summary: Some customers in the Caswell Hill area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
79463.title: July 1 - Saskatoon (Caswell Hill, Westmount & Pleasant Hill) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

79454.summary: Some customers in the Varsity area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
79454.title: July 1 - Calgary (Varsity) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
